skills.name: Libation to Fire
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 25s] Attack enemies with Might of An-Utu, dealing 100% + 900%/1,600%/2,500% ATK of Fire DMG at 0/1/2 stack(s) of charge respectively and ignites the target to further deal 50 Fire DMG for 3/5/9 seconds at 0/1/2 stack(s). The wielder loses 8% of her current HP per second for 5s after using the weapon active skill (will not cause death). Cannot use the weapon active skill at below 10% HP. Initial charge starts at 1 stack; gain 1 stack when spending no less than 30 SP at a time.

skills.name: Solar Prominence
skills.description: The wielder gains 30.0% Total DMG Multiplier, and her weapon active inflicts 20.0% Fire Vulnerability on enemies for 10s. The wielder's initial SP + 30.0. Does not work in Open World.

skills.name: Key of Destruction
skills.description: In co-op raids, team deals 18.0% bonus Total DMG and restores 7.0% HP per second for 5.1s whenever a weapon skill is cast.
